name: awilix-container-navigator
description: Navigate to definitions from a Awilix container.resolve() call

awilixNavigator.diFilePatterns.description: Glob patterns to find Awilix container registration files

awilixNavigator.containerCallPatterns.description: Patterns to detect Awilix container method calls (e.g., 'container.resolve', 'ctx.container.resolve')

awilixNavigator.registrationPatterns.description: Regex patterns to detect how modules are registered in Awilix container files. Use {name} as placeholder for module name and ({ref}) to capture the reference.

awilixNavigator.fileIncludePatterns.description: Patterns to include files that can be registered in the Awilix container (for reverse navigation)

awilixNavigator.searchRootPath.description: Root directory to search for Awilix container usages (relative to workspace root)

awilixNavigator.debugMode.description: Enable debug mode to show detailed logs in the Output panel
